steps.title: Parent Consent
steps.description: Parent must review and approve student participation in the dual enrollment program.

steps.title: Program Participation
steps.description: High school counselor reviews and approves student eligibility for the dual enrollment program.

steps.title: Confirm Enrollment
steps.description: High school counselor reviews and approves course selection.

steps.title: Approve Course
steps.description: College staff reviews and approves course registration.

steps.title: Parent Upload Affidavit
steps.description: Parent must upload homeschool affidavit document.

steps.title: College Review Affidavit
steps.description: College staff reviews the homeschool affidavit and approves or denies eligibility.

steps.title: Approver Approval
steps.description: Approver reviews and approves homeschool student course selection.

steps.title: College Approval
steps.description: College staff reviews and approves course selection for homeschool student.

steps.title: Approver Approval
steps.description: Approver reviews and approves non-partner high school student course selection.

steps.title: College Approval
steps.description: College staff reviews and approves course selection for non-partner high school student.
